profile.que: What is required in each C program?
profile.op1: The program must have at least one function..
profile.op2: The program does not require any function.
profile.ans: (a) The program must have at least one function.

profile.que: Which of the following comment is correct when a macro definition includes arguments?
profile.op1: The opening parenthesis should immediately follow the macro name.
profile.op2: There should be at least one blank between the macro name and the opening parenthesis.
profile.op3: There should be only one blank between the macro name and the opening parenthesis.
profile.op4: All the above comments are correct.
profile.ans: (a) The opening parenthesis should immediately follow the macro name.

profile.que: What is the output of this statement 'printf('%d', (a++))'?
profile.op1: The opening parenthesis should immediately follow the macro name.
profile.op2: There should be at least one blank between the macro name and the opening parenthesis.
profile.op3: There should be only one blank between the macro name and the opening parenthesis.
profile.op4: All the above comments are correct.
profile.ans: (a) The opening parenthesis should immediately follow the macro name.
